p: Previous study showed that oral hygiene alone is totally inadequate as a safeguard against radiotherapy-associated dental caries and addition of the fluoride gel to the caries preventive regimen was notably successful in stopping ongoing caries and in preventing new caries. The preventive effects of fluoride gel were through an increase in the caries resistance of the surface enamel or also included a fluoride-provoked change in the metabolic patterns of the plaque.
